title: Show HN: EchoCopi Local-first, model-agnostic alternative to Google Antigravity
description: I've been building an AI agent framework for myself for the last year because I got tired of re-explaining context to my LLM every morning.Google just announced "Antigravity" to solve this, which looks amazing, but it locks you into their cloud and their mode…
